author: CTPPS
body:
This RP introduces recHits for TotemTiming detector in vertical Roman Pots (90m dedicated run).

- The existing object CTPPSDiamondRecHit was generalized to [CTPPSTimingRecHit](https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/tree/totemTiming_rechitProducer_PR/DataFormats/CTPPSReco/interface/CTPPSTimingRecHit.h) from which [CTPPSDiamondRecHit](https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/tree/totemTiming_rechitProducer_PR/DataFormats/CTPPSReco/interface/CTPPSDiamondRecHit.h) and [TotemTimingRecHit](https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/tree/totemTiming_rechitProducer_PR/DataFormats/CTPPSReco/interface/TotemTimingRecHit.h) inherit.
- Geometry of the new detector added to VeryForwardGeometry: everything new was added in a dedicated directory [TotemTiming](https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/tree/totemTiming_rechitProducer_PR/Geometry/VeryForwardData/data/TotemTiming/), small changes in the existing code.
- RecHitProducer uses CFD to compute time of arrival from SAMPIC samples in the digis

NOTES:
- the geometry will be added to the DB as soon as it is approved. In the meanwhile it is important to point the reconstruction to the xml geometry. A working example is available [here](https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/tree/totemTiming_rechitProducer_PR/RecoCTPPS/TotemRPLocal/test/totemTiming_reco_cfg.py).
- With previous hardware configuration, only 2/3 of the detector is connected. The rest will be connected during TS1.
- Suggested run with good statistics: 314276.

NEXT IN LINE:
- fine tuning of the CFD parameters: the parameters in this PR were chosen doing a scan, however a small tuning could be required in the future.
- check cabling (on going).
- DQM (almost ready).
- add SAMPIC calibration: [TotemTimingConversions](https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/tree/totemTiming_rechitProducer_PR/RecoCTPPS/TotemRPLocal/interface/TotemTimingConversions.h) was designed to be extensible to read 
calibration values without changing the rest of the code. We aspect a small difference on the performance, tests still on going.

Many thanks for your review!
@forthommel
title: Totem Timing RecHit Producer
